title: Directors
context: ยง431:4-313 Directors. (a) No individual shall be a director of a domestic mutual insurer by reason of the individual&rsquo;s holding public office (i.e. ex officio). (b) An individual is disqualified from being or acting as a director if such person: (1) Is adjudged as a bankrupt; (2) Took the benefit of any insolvency law; or (3) Made a general assignment for the benefit of creditors. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
